data.text: @enews I too suffer daily and each day is different. I try to tell myself that I am just having a bad day, not a bad life. But it is so hard day by day.
@enews Where is @drdrew ??? This is a time of need! Please!  @MTV what are you doing to help? You started this mess, help out boy! @TylerBaltierra   We love you! Don't stop believing. #KeepTheFaith
